# fill(_:)

**Instance Method**

Paints a rectangular area with the currently selected fill color.

## Declaration

```swift
func fill(_ rect: CGRect)
```

## Parameters

- **rect**: A rectangle, specified in the Core Graphics coordinate space with values in points.

## Discussion

Before calling this method, select the fill color with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIColor/setFill()] method on an instance of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIColor].

For an example of how to use this method, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsImageRenderer#Creating-an-image-with-an-image-renderer] in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsImageRenderer].

## Drawing content

- **stroke(_:)**: Paints a rectangular path using the currently selected stroke color.
- **stroke(_:blendMode:)**: Paints a rectangular path using the currently selected stroke color and specified blend mode.
- **fill(_:blendMode:)**: Paints a rectangular area with the currently selected fill color using the supplied blend mode.
